title: Just right for you! A gorgeous 2 bed 2 bath apartment awaits!
posting_body: ['Brookside Park Apartments - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1119 sq ft', 'Rent: $1748/Month', 'Terms: 6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Work out in our newly revamped fitness center or simply relax by the pool.', 'You can also play a game of tennis at our tennis courts, or update your social media status in our business center.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by and see why our residents choose to call Brookside Park home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Dishwasher', '− Multi Use Room', '− Oven', '− Trash Compactor', '− Washer/Dryer Hookup', '− Wi-Fi', '− Window Coverings', '− Brushed Nickel Lighting', '− Eat-in Kitchen', '− Faux Hardwood Floors', '− Fully Equipped Kitchens', '− Granite Inspired Countertops', '− Handrails', '− Intrusion alarms', '− Renovated Suites Available', '− Total Electric', '− Upgrade Complete', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '− BBQ/Picnic Area', '− Business Center', '− Clubhouse w/WIFI', '− Controlled Access Entry', '− Fitness Center', '− Grill', '− Pet Care', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Terrace Level', '− Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '− Access to Marta', '− Clothes Care Center', '− Corporate Suites', '− Fax/Copy Services', '− Maintenance on site', '− Minutes from Downtown Atlanta', '− Picnic Areas and Gazebo', '− Public Transportation', '− Resort Inspired Pool', '− Roommate Style Floor Plans Available', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '565 Saint Johns Ave Sw', 'Atlanta, GA 30315', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Brookside Park Apartments is a pet friendly community that welcome two pets per apartment home.', 'The pet fee is $300 non-refundable per pet.', 'There is a $15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Non-Refundable Admin Fee $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A943E06E4E074D']
